div.style: width: 400px; margin: 20px auto; text-align: center; display: flex; flex-direction: column;
height: 25%; border-top-left-radius: 20px; border-top-right-radius: 20px; background-color: red; vertical-align: center;
height: 50%; border-bottom-left-radius: 20px; border-bottom-right-radius: 20px; background-color: white; border: 1px solid red;
